description: Cross country mountain bike trail loop. Starting at TOBIANO golf resort outside kamloops, you bike about 500 m towards Savona. A cattle grid entrance is noted towards Six mile lake and Pat Lake. ( 50 44'08"N 120 42'13W). Start climbing on bike or park you vehicle 1km up the hill to start the loop. (50  44' 40" N 120 42'54" W). Turn left after 3.6 km( Way 1) continue to climb up for 12 km ( past way 2 a split in road where you keep right) to the TOP ( 50 38'58"N 120 43' 5"). Take a great decent down. keep left when you meet up with T junction forestry road after 3k( way 3). Continue down small forestry road back to start. Alternative: At Way 4 - Choices ( 50 40'11.8"N 120 43"5" W) you can choose to do a single track descent and follow Way 5(a cattlegrid) ,Way 6, Way 7, Way  8 all the way to your car.
directions: From Kamloops take road to Cache creek and stop at tobiano golf resort
title: 6 mile lake loop
